text.title: Torrential rains cause deaths, wreak havoc across much of Texas
text.head: Torrential rains cause deaths, wreak havoc across much of Texas
Sources

list.item: Krishnadev Calamur. "Texas Governor Calls Flood Damage 'Devastating'" — NPR , May 25, 2015
Elisha Fieldstadt, Alexander Smith and Gabe Gutierrez. "Texas, Oklahoma Floods: 12 People Missing as More Rain Forecast" — NBC News , May 25, 2015
